text: Vitaliy Ivanovych Hodulian (Ukrainian: Віталій Іванович Годулян, born 18 September 1968 in Odessa, Ukraine) is a former Ukrainian professional football referee. He has been a full international for FIFA since 2001.FIFA. "Ukraina: Referees" . == References == ==External links== * * * Vitaliy Hodulyan referee profile at allplayers.in.ua Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Odessa Category:Ukrainian football referees
title: Vitaliy Hodulian
